text: Simon Hooper (born 15 July 1982) is an English professional football referee who officiates in the Premier League having been promoted to the Select Group of Referees in 2018. He has officiated three Premier League fixtures, the encounter between Norwich City and Crystal Palace, in August 2015, Newcastle United’s home match against Burnley in January 2018 and Newcastle v Leicester City in September of the same year. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:English football referees Category:People from Swindon Category:Living people Category:Premier League referees
title: Simon Hooper
